document.full_text: manny pacquiao's trainer freddie roach has one nagging concern ahead of the filipino's wbo welterweight title defense against shane mosley on saturday.
document.title: manny pacquiao camp stresses need for patience in mosley bout
lines_and_colors: manny pacquiao's trainer freddie roach has one nagging concern ahead of the filipino's wbo welterweight title defense against shane mosley on saturday.
